data.message: Can someone from Facebook staff contact me very important

replies.message: Hi Dena. Can you tell us more about what you're experiencing? -Kiara
My original Facebook page has been delete it by yall. I want my original page back
It's been almost 2 months now and nothing

Hey Dena. It's possible your account was disabled. If your account was disabled, you'll see a special message when you try to log in. Here are some reasons your account may have been disabled: http://bit.ly/2iXZnXl. If you believe it was disabled by mistake, you can submit an appeal here: http://bit.ly/2iXSvZU.  You can also learn how to recover an old account you can't log into here: http://bit.ly/2jy63Q0. If your account was permanently deleted, unfortunately we can't recover it. -Kiara

I read up above which you wrote I don't put disrespectful things on that page.
I followed the steps like the Facebook thanks it and this is my page is under review for further documents.
For 2 months!! Dis is to much.  What documents do they need ? Thank you for your help but I feel like a tec should be on this situation,bugs. I really want my page back
Facebook  could you possiably fix the issue  with playing voice messages through chat ?  they worked fine for me Monday not not working just loading  whats up with that ? Thanks !

Hi Facebook, you guys massively unpublished our pages without any reason, some of them were more than a year already https://www.facebook.com/business/help/community/question/?id=10212224076610371&rdrhc. Please help us to fix our problem.
My page was 12 years old. Someone from turkey hacked it this morning and so far Facebook has yet to try and help
Facebook shut my page down and I did nothing
They won't help. They don't care
I appealed many times but you said that you dont offer support for blocked or disabled accounts. I gave you IDs facebook. What do you need now just to unlock my account!?
I truly did not deserve this. I need my original page back
The same thing happen with my page,6 years old page with 54.000 likes  was unpublished without any exact reason.
I believe this is not a way how to fix this problem, because my patients is not unlimited when facebook support team ignoring my simple question without answer.
